backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing access control, invite code handling, user profiles with required country, check-ins, and related queries and mutations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles with optional country to new profiles with mandatory country and removing obsolete check-in data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files across authentication, profile, pairing, check-ins, dashboard, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS configuration defining global OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variants, and common element styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication, mandatory country onboarding, pairing flow, and routing between dashboard-related views.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Application layout providing header, pairing badge, footer, and optional auth button with consistent theming and toast support.
frontend/src/features/checkins/CheckInCo: Renders the UI for composing a daily check‑in, handling emoji selection, message input, submission, and premium limits.
frontend/src/features/checkins/constants: Defines available mood emojis and the maximum check‑in message length.
frontend/src/features/checkins/TodayStat: Displays today's check‑ins for the user and partner, showing status, counts, and latest messages.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useCheckI: React Query hook fetching historical check‑ins from the backend with a configurable limit.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useSubmit: Mutation hook to submit a new check‑in and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useTodayC: React Query hook retrieving today's check‑ins for the authenticated user.
Builds and exports a deduplicated, sorted list of countries from the ISO dataset.
frontend/src/features/country/CountriesM: Interactive map and dropdown component for selecting a country by clicking or searching.
frontend/src/features/country/iso3166Alp: Provides the full ISO‑3166‑1 alpha‑2 country code dataset.
frontend/src/features/country/worldMapPa: Contains simplified SVG paths for countries used to render an interactive world map.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/CheckInH: Displays a user's recent check-ins with loading, empty, and populated states, highlighting whether each entry is from the user or their partner.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Main dashboard showing today's check-in tools, streaks, and history via tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/features/emotionalmap/Emoti: Shows today's emotional comparison between partners based on their latest check-ins and provides a status message.
frontend/src/features/pairing/PairingCar: UI for generating an invite code or joining a partner using a code, including copy and error handling.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useDisconn: Mutation hook that disconnects the current partner and invalidates all related queries.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useInviteT: Hook that generates and stores an invite token using a backend actor.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useJoinWit: Hook that joins a partner via invite token and refreshes pairing-related queries.
frontend/src/features/pairing/usePairing: Query hook fetching the user's partner and their profile to determine pairing status.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileSet: Dialog for entering or completing a user profile with name and country selection.
frontend/src/features/profile/useGetCall: Query hook retrieving the current user's profile from the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/profile/useHasPrem: Query hook checking whether the current user has premium status.
frontend/src/features/profile/useSaveCal: Mutation hook saving the user's profile with validation and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/features/relationshipStatus: UI component allowing users to select and submit a relationship status via mutation with loading and error handling.
Hook fetching current relationship status and user profile to determine permissions and loading state.
Mutation hook that updates relationship status with permission checks and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsV: Settings page enabling country editing and partner disconnection with confirmation dialogs and related mutations.
frontend/src/features/streak/StreakSecti: Displays the shared streak with animation when it increases, hiding content if unpaired or loading.
frontend/src/features/streak/useSharedSt: Hook fetching the numeric shared streak from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user identity and refetches dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that queries are organized by feature directories.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/checkInHelpers.ts: Utility to return the most recent check-in from a specific author.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, identity provider, and rendering the root app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from both session and the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current state, architecture, known issues, and implemented features for a relationship app with check-ins and shared streaks.
